message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it has tremendous value and potential. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, and I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I have to consider the value I've placed on this product, and I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.
